name: Avian Reaper
description:
---

If you want to see the highscore at the end and actually beat the game, play the highscore_fix version. (It doesn't work on the original)

---

---

You take the role of a soul harvester. Your task is to spread faith of the cult in the masses, and then perform ritual murders so that the souls are of the highest quality. The action takes place in the Middle Ages, so dangers await at every turn. Collect souls and don't forget to keep an eye on the human population, they may die out.
